resources.string:
Use BookWorm to keep track of books you have read, and you intend to read. Maintain a log of text books, audio books, online articles - all in one place for later reference and sharing.
 

Create as many lists as you want, we start you with "Books I've Read" and "Books I want to Read"

Add books to a list by scanning, searching, or direct entry

Select a list and view books (sort too)
